bonus.name: Rzut otrzymuje premiÄ™

modifyDC.name: Modify the DC of your actions. Will work for concentation checks and death saves you make too
modifyDC.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: save/conc/death (check/skill/tool are supported but usually they don't have DC set). Use bonus=5 to add 5 to DC or set=15 to set it to the value provided. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

modifyDC.name: An aura that modifies the DC of actions the affected tokens take.
modifyDC.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of: save/conc/death (check/skill/tool are supported but usually they don't have DC set). Use bonus/set, radius as usual

noAdvantage.name: An aura that suppresses advantage mode
noAdvantage.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Use radius as usual

noCritical.name: An aura that suppresses criticals
noCritical.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of all/attack/damage. Use radius as usual

noDisadvantage.name: An aura that suppresses disadvantage mode
noDisadvantage.description: Replace ACTIONTYPE with one of all/attack/check/concentration/damage/death/initiative/save/skill/tool. Use radius as usual

flags.automated-conditions-5e.attack.fum.name: Alter the fumbleThreshold of the attacks
flags.automated-conditions-5e.attack.fum.description: Use threshold=5 to increase by 5 or set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.grants.att.name: Grant altered fumbleThreshold to opponent's attacks
flags.automated-conditions-5e.grants.att.description: Use threshold=5 to increase by 5 or set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.attac.name: An aura altering the fumbleThreshold of the attacks in radius
flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.attac.description: Use radius=15;threshold=5 to increase by 5 or radius=20;set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.damage.ext.name: Increase or decrease the number of dice rolled for each denomination
flags.automated-conditions-5e.damage.ext.description: Use bonus=4 to increase the number of dice rolled by 4.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.grants.dam.name: Grant an increase or decrease to the number of dice rolled for each denomination
flags.automated-conditions-5e.grants.dam.description: Use bonus=-1 to decrease the number of dice rolled by 1

flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.damag.name: An aura increasing or decreasing the number of dice rolled for each denomination
flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.damag.description: Use bonus=2; radius=10 to increase the number of dice rolled for each denomination in a 10 distance units radius.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.modifyAC.name: Modify the AC of the actor against incoming attacks
flags.automated-conditions-5e.modifyAC.description: Use bonus=5 to add 5 to AC or set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.grant.modi.name: Grant modified AC to the opponent of the attack
flags.automated-conditions-5e.grant.modi.description: Use bonus=-5 to subtract 5 from the AC or set=15 to set the value to 15. You can use roll data, dice formulas and evaluate conditions too.

flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.modif.name: An aura modifying the AC of the relevant tokens in radius
flags.automated-conditions-5e.aura.modif.description: Use radius=10;bonus=1d4; or radius=15;set=15. The former will give a bonus to AC and the latter will set to the value provided

AC5E.TokenlessActorWarning.Hint: The module doesn't affect currently rolls from actors without a token on the scene!
AC5E.TokenlessActorWarning.Name: Show tokenless actor warning
AC5E.TokenlessActorWarning.Text: AC5E warning: The actor you are rolling for, doesn't have a token on the scene. The results can be skewed
